title: CNBC Daily Open: U.S. markets got the Fed’s message: Interest rate hikes are probably here to stay
description: After weeks of defying the Federal Reserve, U.S. markets realized that interest rate hikes are probably here to stay.

title: Disney to cut 7,000 jobs and slash $5.5 billion in costs as it unveils vast restructuring
description: Disney unveiled a vast corporate restructuring, in Bob Iger's most significant move since his return.

title: U.S. explores working with India to increase economic competition against China, says Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo
description: Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo says a collaboration between the U.S. and India can compete with the Chinese semiconductor monopoly.

title: Robinhood board approves plan to buy back Sam Bankman-Fried's $578 million stake
description: Robinhood will work with the Department of Justice to purchase Sam Bankman-Fried's shares, which amount to 7% of the company.

title: Affirm cuts 19% of workforce; shares tank on earnings miss
description: Affirm reported second quarter earnings that fell below analyst estimates on both the top and bottom lines.

title: Disney beats expectations as streaming subscriber losses aren't as bad as feared
description: Disney reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

title: Alphabet shares fall 7% following Google's A.I. event
description: Shares of Alphabet tumbled Wednesday after the company held an event to promote its new artificial intelligence chatbot.

title: Spy balloon confirms 'pattern of Chinese behavior' that poses threat to NATO members, Stoltenberg says
description: Stoltenberg said European countries have seen an increase in Chinese intelligence activities.

title: Netflix starts cracking down on password-sharing in four countries
description: Users will be asked to set a "primary location" for their Netflix accounts and will be allowed two "sub accounts" for users who don't live in that household.

title: Lawyers and advisors in FTX bankruptcy have billed nearly $20 million for 51 days of work
description: FTX's top bankruptcy, legal and financial advisors have billed the company more than $19.6 million in fees, according to Tuesday bankruptcy court filings.

title: Fed Governor Christopher Waller warns that interest rates could go higher than expectations
description: Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller on Wednesday talked tough on inflation, warning that the fight is not over.

title: Cruz Foam makes styrofoam alternative from shrimp shells and food waste
description: Cruz Foam has launched a packaging line to displace polystyrene peanuts and bubble wrap in ecommerce.

title: Chinese tech giant Alibaba working on a ChatGPT rival; shares jump
description: Alibaba joins a flurry of technology firms including Google and Baidu to respond to OpenAI and Microsoft's ChatGPT AI chatbot.

title: Microsoft's $69 billion Activision takeover could harm gamers, British regulator says
description: The U.K.'s competition regulator said Wednesday that Microsoft's $69 billion acquisition of gaming giant Activision Blizzard could harm competition in the U.K. gaming market.

title: All you need to know about ChatGPT, the A.I. chatbot that's got the world talking and tech giants clashing
description: Schools, corporate boardrooms and social media are abuzz with talk about ChatGPT, the artificial intelligence chatbot developed by AI startup OpenAI.

title: Chinese food delivery firm Meituan plans to hire 10,000 workers as U.S. tech giants ax jobs
description: Meituan's hiring spree is in contrast to Silicon Valley technology giants from Microsoft to Alphabet that have laid off thousands of workers.

title: Azeri BTC crude loadings suspended at a major oil export hub in Turkey after earthquakes
description: Crude oil loadings from Turkey's Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan terminal in the Mediterranean have been suspended, following earthquakes that devastated Turkey and Syria.

title: ByteDance is testing food delivery service via its Chinese version of TikTok
description: ByteDance's Douyin is trialing a food delivery service in China "that enables merchants to promote and sell 'group-buying' packages."

title: China's economy will grow 5% this year, Fitch Ratings says in upgraded forecast
description: China's economy will expand by 5% in 2023, Fitch Ratings said in a revised forecast on Wednesday – an improved outlook from its previous 4.1% growth prediction from December.

title: Maersk, a global barometer for trade, posts record 2022 earnings but warns of a tough year ahead
description: Maersk, one of the world's largest container shipping firms, on Wednesday reported the best full-year result in its history.

title: Big Oil rakes in record profit haul of nearly $200 billion, fueling calls for higher taxes
description: Altogether, the five Big Oil companies reported combined profits of $196.3 billion last year, more than the economic output of most countries.

title: SocGen reports 64% slide in annual profits but beats market expectations
description: Societe Generale on Wednesday reported a 64% drop in annual net profits for 2022, weighed on by lower activity in its domestic banking unit, currency effects and increased operating expenses.

title: Five key economic points in Biden's 2023 State of the Union address to Congress
description: Biden renewed his call for levying a tax on billionaires, continued his fight against junk fees, cracked down on monopolistic practices and high drug prices.

title: World's largest drone maker is unfazed — even if it's blacklisted by the U.S.
description: The world's biggest drone maker DJI found itself embroiled in the Russia-Ukraine conflict last year.

title: Luxury brand Six Senses is opening its first hotel in Australia
description: The hotel is scheduled to open in 2025 on a 22-hectare estate called Burnham Beeches, located 25 miles from Melbourne in the Dandenong mountain range.
